title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 111.4 - Eligibility for admission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 111.4 - Eligibility for admission

State Regulations
(a) Each
applicant for admission shall intend to pursue a professional career in the
field of the particular school for which application is made. (b) All applicants for admission to the
program shall have completed eighth grade and be between the ages of 14 and 18
years. (c) All applicants for
admission shall participate in the screening process established to determine
artistic ability and talents. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
111.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
